name: Parsleyed Noodles
description: These generously buttered noodles, sprinkled with just a quarter cup of parsley for color and freshness, are the perfect blank canvas for practically any stew or braise.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound wide egg noodles, cooked according to package directions and drained
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients, in a large serving dish, toss gently and serve.
